Residual.name: Residual Energy
Residual.description: Equal to the energy you ended your last turn with.

Revenge.name: Revenge Energy
Revenge.description: 1 <c={0}>REVENGE</c> <c=energy>ENERGY</c> for each quarter of your hull you have missing. 4 instead if you have only 1 hull.

Thermal.name: Thermal Energy
Thermal.description: Equal to the heat you have.

Kinetic.name: Kinetic Energy
Kinetic.description: Equal to how far you moved last turn.

Charged.name: Charged Energy
Charged.description: 1 <c={0}>CHARGED</c> <c=energy>ENERGY</c> for each turn so far, up to 6.

Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice Energy
Sacrifice.description: Equal to the number of cards in your hand last turn.

Core.name: Core Energy
Core.description: 10 <c={0}>CORE</c> <c=energy>ENERGY</c> on the first turn, otherwise equal to the <c={0}>CORE</c> <c=energy>ENERGY</c> you ended your last turn with.

energy.name: {0} Energy Cost
energy.description: Lose <c=keyword>{0}</c> extra <c={1}>{2} ENERGY</c>. If you don't have enough, this action does not happen.

moddedEnergyVariableHint.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = Your <c={{Color}}>{{Type}} ENERGY</c> after paying for this card (<c=keyword>{{Energy}}</c>).
moddedEnergyVariableHint.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = Your <c={{Color}}>{{Type}} ENERGY</c> after paying for this card.
